text_logic_form: Point $P$ is the centroid of triangle $XYZ$.
The length of the line $KP$ is $3$ units.
The length of the line $XJ$ is $8$ units.
Find the length of the line $XK$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Point $P$ is the centroid of triangle $XYZ$.
The length of the line $KP$ is $3$ units.
The length of the line $XJ$ is $8$ units.
Find the length of the line $XK$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $XJ$ is $8$ units.
Point $K$ lies on the line connecting $Z$ and $Y$.
Point $P$ lies on the line connecting $Z$ and $J$.
Point $J$ lies on the line connecting $Y$ and $X$.
Point $P$ lies on the line connecting $Y$ and $L$.
Point $P$ lies on the line connecting $X$ and $K$.
